import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";// appApi
import appApi from"../services/appApi";const initialState=null;export const userSlice=createSlice({name:"products",initialState,reducers:{logout:()=>initialState,addNotification:(state,action)=>{state.notifications.unshift(action.payload);},resetNotifications:state=>{state.notifications.forEach(obj=>{obj.status="read";});}},extraReducers:builder=>{builder.addMatcher(appApi.endpoints.signup.matchFulfilled,(_,_ref)=>{let{payload}=_ref;return payload;});builder.addMatcher(appApi.endpoints.login.matchFulfilled,(_,_ref2)=>{let{payload}=_ref2;return payload;});builder.addMatcher(appApi.endpoints.addToCart.matchFulfilled,(_,_ref3)=>{let{payload}=_ref3;return payload;});builder.addMatcher(appApi.endpoints.removeFromCart.matchFulfilled,(_,_ref4)=>{let{payload}=_ref4;return payload;});builder.addMatcher(appApi.endpoints.increaseCartProduct.matchFulfilled,(_,_ref5)=>{let{payload}=_ref5;return payload;});builder.addMatcher(appApi.endpoints.decreaseCartProduct.matchFulfilled,(_,_ref6)=>{let{payload}=_ref6;return payload;});builder.addMatcher(appApi.endpoints.createOrder.matchFulfilled,(_,_ref7)=>{let{payload}=_ref7;return payload;});}});export const{logout,addNotification,resetNotifications}=userSlice.actions;export default userSlice.reducer;
